componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}}

Thank you for visiting with us during the MD&M West show.  We hope you enjoyed your time at the event.

Now that you're home,  I'd really enjoy hearing from you to discuss any potential opportunities to see which of our product offerings would be a fit.  

Below are a few resources that may be helpful in learning more about our products. Feel free to visit one of the product pages on our website or reach out to me, my contact info is below.
